meanings.meaning_en_US: Making little or no noise.

examples.sentence: Please be [quiet] during the presentation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在演講期間請保持安靜。

examples.sentence: The library is a [quiet] place to study.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 圖書館是一個安靜的學習場所。

examples.sentence: She enjoys a [quiet] evening at home.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡在家度過安靜的晚上。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The end of life; the cessation of all biological functions that sustain a living organism.

examples.sentence: The novel explores the theme of [death].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這本小說探討了[死亡]的主題。

examples.sentence: He could not accept the [death] of his beloved pet.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他無法接受他心愛的寵物的[死亡]。

examples.sentence: Many cultures have rituals surrounding [death].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多文化都有關於[死亡]的儀式。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Frequently; many times.

examples.sentence: I [often] go for a walk in the evening.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我[經常]在傍晚散步。

examples.sentence: She [often] reads before bed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她[經常]在睡前閱讀。

examples.sentence: They [often] visit their grandparents.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們[經常]拜訪祖父母。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Informal way to say 'no'.

examples.sentence: Are you coming to the party? [Nope].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你會來派對嗎？不。

examples.sentence: Did you finish your homework? [Nope].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你完成作業了嗎？不。

examples.sentence: Is this the right way? [Nope].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是正確的路嗎？不。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The part of the earth's surface that is not covered by water.

examples.sentence: They own a beautiful piece of [land] by the lake.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們擁有湖邊一塊美麗的土地。

examples.sentence: The farmer worked hard to cultivate the [land].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 農夫努力耕作這片土地。

examples.sentence: Protecting [land] is vital for future generations.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 保護土地對於未來的世代至關重要。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The day after today.

examples.sentence: We will meet again [tomorrow].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們明天再見。

examples.sentence: Do you have plans for [tomorrow]?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你明天有計劃嗎？

examples.sentence: He promised to call me [tomorrow].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他答應明天打電話給我。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A building or part of a building where goods or services are sold.

examples.sentence: She went to the [shop] to buy some groceries.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她去商店買一些雜貨。

examples.sentence: The [shop] specializes in handmade jewelry.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家商店專門出售手工珠寶。

examples.sentence: There’s a new coffee [shop] opened nearby.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 附近新開了一家咖啡店。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A variety of corn that expands when heated and is eaten as a snack.

examples.sentence: We always make [popcorn] while watching movies.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在看電影時總是做爆米花。

examples.sentence: She loves caramel [popcorn] for snacks.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡吃焦糖爆米花作為零食。

examples.sentence: The [popcorn] was fresh and hot at the fair.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 展覽會上爆米花是新鮮和熱的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To be unsuccessful in achieving a goal or desired outcome.

examples.sentence: If you don't study, you will [fail] the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果你不學習，你會未能通過考試。

examples.sentence: She didn't want to [fail] her family.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她不想讓家人失望。

examples.sentence: Many companies [fail] because of poor management.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多公司因管理不善而未能成功。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To fill a container with items, usually for transport or storage.

examples.sentence: I need to [pack] my suitcase for the trip.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要為這次旅行打包我的行李。

examples.sentence: They [pack] the food neatly into boxes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們把食物整齊地裝進箱子裡。

examples.sentence: She will [pack] her books into the backpack.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她會把書裝進背包裡。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In need of rest or sleep.

examples.sentence: I feel [tired] after a long day at work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我在工作了一整天後感到疲憊。

examples.sentence: She looked [tired] and needed a break.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她看起來很疲憊，需要休息。

examples.sentence: Are you [tired] of this routine?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你對這個日常感到厭倦嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: At no time in the past or future; on no occasion.

examples.sentence: I have [never] seen such a beautiful sunset.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我從來沒有見過這麼美的日落。

examples.sentence: He will [never] give up.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他絕對不會放棄。

examples.sentence: She has [never] been to Paris.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她從未去過巴黎。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Any person; it doesn't matter who.

examples.sentence: [Anyone] can join the club.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 任何人都可以加入這個俱樂部。

examples.sentence: Is [anyone] home?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 家裡有任何人嗎？

examples.sentence: You can ask [anyone] for help.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以向任何人尋求幫助。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To select from a number of alternatives.

examples.sentence: You can [choose] any flavor you like.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以選擇任何你喜歡的口味

examples.sentence: It's important to [choose] wisely.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 明智的選擇是很重要的

examples.sentence: I think I will [choose] the blue shirt.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我想我會選擇藍色襯衫

meanings.meaning_en_US: A hinged barrier used to close off an entrance or exit.

examples.sentence: Please close the [gate] after entering.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在進入後關上大門。

examples.sentence: The metal [gate] creaked as it swung open.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 金屬大門在打開時發出吱吱聲。

examples.sentence: A tall [gate] marks the entrance to the garden.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一扇高大的大門標誌著花園的入口。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An additional one of the same type.

examples.sentence: Can I have [another] piece of cake?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我可以再要一塊蛋糕嗎？

examples.sentence: [Another] option could be more effective.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 另一種選擇可能會更有效。

examples.sentence: He needs [another] chance to prove himself.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他需要另一個機會來證明自己。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to refer to an unspecified thing or things.

examples.sentence: You can ask me for [anything].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以向我要求任何東西。

examples.sentence: Is there [anything] I can help you with?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 有什麼可以幫助你的嗎？

examples.sentence: I don’t want [anything] from you.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我不想要你的任何東西。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An object or entity that is not specifically named or identified.

examples.sentence: What is that [thing] over there?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那邊是什麼東西？

examples.sentence: I need to buy a [thing] for dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要買一樣東西來吃晚餐。

examples.sentence: She has a strange [thing] in her hand.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她手裡有一個奇怪的東西。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Giving or ready to give help.

examples.sentence: She is always so [helpful] when I need assistance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每當我需要幫助時，她總是那麼有幫助

examples.sentence: His suggestions were very [helpful].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的建議非常有幫助

examples.sentence: The staff was [helpful] during our visit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在我們訪問期間，工作人員非常有幫助

meanings.meaning_en_US: To keep safe or rescue from harm or danger.

examples.sentence: I need to [save] my work before the computer crashes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要在電腦崩潰之前保存我的工作。

examples.sentence: He tried to [save] the drowning man.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他試圖拯救溺水者。

examples.sentence: You can [save] money by using coupons.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 使用優惠券可以省錢。
